message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable product. I'm thinking of a price of $1200000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1100000. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. Would you be willing to consider $950000?
I understand you're trying to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to compromise at $1050000. It's a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
I understand that you're trying to make a fair deal, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $1000000?
I can see you're close to making a decision, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1000000. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. It's the best I can do.
